summary: A simple Khajiit follower located in Left Hand mine.
descriptionHtml:
Hello.

As you can see, Dro'zethorr is an old Khajiit that was a mercenary in his younger days, but he retired in Left Hand mine when age got up to him. But he still eagers for some adventure...

He is located in Left Hand mine, it is very easy to find. Just when you exit Markarth head right and you will find it. When you enter look around a little bit and you will find him.

This is my first mod and i hope you like it :)
author: Arkentran
